ygData.subject: Re: Leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: SNIP Remember when a Backpack in every slot in the bank seemed impossible? Now I m pondering spending all my plat on tailored backpacks for every slot that has
ygData.messageBody:
SNIP Remember when a Backpack in every slot in
the bank seemed impossible? Now I'm pondering
spending all my plat on tailored backpacks for every slot
that has a backpack on my Druid. LOL SNIP<br><br>Do
NOT do that! There is an alternative! You used to be
able to get 10 slot sewing kits from Spoolie Gee in N
Ro but they made them no longer available to force
folks to use looms.<br> You can go to Velious and
purchase 10 slot tool boxes (hold giant (size) for less
than 2pp each. They are on a gnome near the dock. He's
in an igloo if I remember correctly.<br> You can
also go to Luclin (The Bazaar to be exact) and
purchase merchant bags (10 slot, 25weight (ouch) holds
giant) for less than 2 pp each also. And the merchant is
not more than a few feet from the bank that is
there!Now all 7 of my toons have 80 spaces in the bank! The
only problem is finding enough keepable stuff to fill
them!<br><br>Timmye Cousteau<br>31 Aquanaut of Karana
